overview: Henri Pachard like Louis Malle is a gifted, prolific, visionary film-maker, Pachard's films idolize women, and skillfully educate the most sophisticated viewer of eroticism (both male and female) with exquisite, and mesmerizing "true to life" encounters.
tagline: A new milestone in erotica... See it with someone you love or would like to.
title: Outlaw Ladies
